snippet: The Los Angeles Kings reached the Stanley Cup finals with a zealous dedication to a detailed game plan — and a remarkable willingness to throw it out the window when necessary....

headline.print_headline: LA Kings Shuffle Lines to Spark Cup Finals Win
headline.main: LA Kings Shuffle Lines to Spark Cup Finals Win

lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Kings reached the Stanley Cup finals with a zealous dedication to a detailed game plan — and a remarkable willingness to throw it out the window when necessary.
